org.hibernate.tool.schema.internal

Class SchemaCreatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.tool.schema.internal.SchemaCreatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaCreator

    public class SchemaCreatorImpl
extends Object
implements SchemaCreator
    This is functionally nothing more than the creation script from the older SchemaExport class (plus some additional stuff in the script).
